channel.title: Connection issues, help if you beast at coding!
channel.description: hey all that read this post, i'm having connection problems. well i'm no but other people are, i am the only person that can connect. i have a no-ip that works, and iv'e portforwarded, i can't figure ut how to fix this please help! sincerly, w4rf4c3

item.title: Connection issues, help if you beast at coding!
item.dc:creator: @pluh1 pluh1
item.description:
@pluh1 wrote:

You might not be using the correct IP. I know so many people that just did something stupid, and used the Default Gateway instead of the IP Address. One has 1 digit at the end the other has 3, but it matters. That might be the problem, it’s just something stupid. I think you just screwed up somewhere. And if you can, though this probably won’t help, make a second one and set the protocol to UDP. Or if you can, just select both for that one port forward.

Read full topic
item.source: Connection issues, help if you beast at coding!
